TopicTitle: 1.2.0 MechJeb landing guidance not working with SCANSat

Articles.Content: Whenever I place a SCANSat landing target it doesn't appear for MechJeb landing guidance, it just says "Pick target on map" and the "Land at Target" button is grayed out.
Yes, that's right. What's your question?
It said it would on the SCANSat page.
